statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT instrument_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY instrument_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price <= 1000;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY instrument_name ASC;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE instrument_name LIKE '%guitar%' OR instrument_name LIKE '%piano%';
SELECT instrument_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY instrument_id HAVING total_quantity > 20 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT id, name FROM instruments WHERE type = 'Guitar';
SELECT name, type FROM instruments WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, type, quantity FROM instruments ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE type = 'Piano' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM instruments WHERE quantity <= 5 AND type IN ('Guitar', 'Drums');
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_instruments FROM instruments WHERE type = 'Violin';
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE name LIKE '%keyboard%' OR quantity > 20 LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT id, name, type FROM instruments WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, type, price FROM instruments ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM instruments WHERE type = 'Guitar';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE type='Guitar';
SELECT id, name, price FROM instruments WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT instruments.name, suppliers.name AS supplier_name, transactions.quantity FROM instruments JOIN suppliers ON instruments.id = transactions.instrument_id JOIN transactions ON suppliers.id = transactions.supplier_id;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM instruments;

SELECT instruments.name, transactions.quantity, transactions.transaction_date FROM instruments JOIN transactions ON instruments.id = transactions.instrument_id WHERE transactions.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 100;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, registration_date FROM students WHERE instrument_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT transaction_id, instrument_id, supplier_id, quantity, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT student_id, student_name, registration_date, instrument_name FROM students JOIN inventory ON students.instrument_id = inventory.instrument_id WHERE registration_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM instruments ORDER BY instrument_id DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, quantity FROM instruments WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT student_name, instrument_name FROM students JOIN instruments ON students.instrument_id = instruments.instrument_id;
SELECT class_name, schedule FROM classes WHERE schedule > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY schedule DESC;
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM equipment WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 500
SELECT student_name, instrument_name, equipment_name FROM students s JOIN instruments i ON s.instrument_id = i.instrument_id JOIN equipment e ON s.equipment_id = e.equipment_id
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE instrument_specialty = 'Violin' OR equipment_specialty = 'Guitar'
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, schedule FROM classes c JOIN instructors i ON c.instructor_id = i.instructor_id
